data.title: Gibson Les Paul Studio Guitars
data.meta_description: Les Paul Studio guitars are a cornerstone of the Gibson catalogue. Available now at Andertons on 0% finance and with free delivery - subject to status.
data.text: The traditional all-Mahogany construction remains intact with Gibson's Les Paul Studio guitars, producing the rich tones that people come to expect from LPs. Equipped with high-output 498T and 490R pickups, these instruments are well-suited for raunchy overdrive. Just engage their push-pull coil-tap functions, though, and you'll attain convincing single-coil tones that sound crystal-clear with clean amp settings.
